mealsContent.title: MEALS MODEL
mealsContent.description: Hotel-Living meal plans are designed for comfort and long-term stays, not luxury dining experiences.

practicalApproach.title: SIMPLE, PRACTICAL MEAL APPROACH
practicalApproach.description: Focus on balanced, consistent meals that residents will enjoy throughout their stay.

costEfficiency.title: COST EFFICIENCY
costEfficiency.description: Advance bookings allow for better planning and cost control.
items: Known guest preferences and dietary requirements
Zero food waste through planned portions
